item.description:
Portland, Maine--Fresh from his strong showings in the Nevada and Louisiana Caucuses, Presidential candidate Dr. Ron Paul is flying to Maine. Dr. Paul will spend the day Monday, January 28, meeting with supporters and the media prior to the Maine Caucuses, which are scheduled to take place February 1-3.

At 9:30, Dr. Paul will be speaking to students and community members at the University of Southern Maine in Portland. The talk will be presented in the Hannaford Lecture Hall at the Abromson Community Education Center. The Center is located at 88 Bedford Street, on the USM campus in Portland. Parking is available at a garage connected to the building.

Please call 207-409-8969 or 207-699-2909 with any further questions.

In addition to the Portland office, the Ron Paul for President campaign has offices in Auburn, at 112 Center Street, and in Bangor, at 91 Main Street, across from the Children's Museum.
item.name: Dr Paul in Maine
